This tells me two things: he doesn't have a clue who or what Planned Parenthood really is now but would make sure he did before supporting their refunding and he's a business-minded man, who when put between a rock and a place he knows nothing about (PP), he's not going to burn his bridges- at least until he's sure about what he's talking about. Trump is spot on when it comes to ...
